site_name: 1-5 Cromwell Place, 35-36 Thurloe Place and 3, 4, 4a and 20 Thurloe Place Mews, LONDON, SW7
description: Details required by Condition 15 (Trees and landscaping - as approved) of planning permission PP/19/01863 (Removal of condition 4c of planning permission 17/05132 (designs for mansard to include dormers) and variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission 17/05132 and listed building consent 17/05133 to permit tenant revisions including: introduction of hanging walls (to facilitate use of the buildings as functioning gallery space), retention of existing layout (1st floor at 1 Cromwell Place & 4th floor at 2 Cromwell Place), confirmation of heating/ cooling units, revisions to the layout (lower ground floor WCs at 1 CP & introduction of low-voltage rack room & layout to second floor gallery at 1 CP & third floor lift access at 1 CP, teapoints/ WCs at 3rd & 4th floors at 4 CP), move internal partition within pavilion reception area, new sliding door to pavilion, increase in height to lift shaft overrun at 4 CP, installation of freestanding bar within members area (MAJOR APPLICATION))
